subject: Fix dark mode color inconsistencies across components
body:
Added missing dark: variants for text and background colors:
- ExportButtons: Clear button text
- ErrorBoundary: Error icon, title, and message text
- StyleTab: Overlay status On/Off indicator
- TemplatesTab: Custom colors hint text
- LayoutTab: Cell selector hint text
- MediaTab: Sample images chevron icon

https://claude.ai/code/session_01AQxUcta7zmziDFsrmzzuTm
title: Fix dark mode color inconsistencies across components
